[Okay I'm tired of this, the "gestalts" topic has stopped coming to me so I 
am now officially recalling Optimal Prime so he can handle Motormaster at 
the Chivtron base.] "It's about time that happened," Optimal Prime said to 
himself, he transformed back into his supersonic attack mode and flew off in 
the direction of the chivtron fort.
